section.title: Supported Networking Configuration
section.p: Before integrating EMC storage into your Helion OpenStack deployment, you must ensure that the Helion OpenStack cluster is configured appropriately. The following post-installation networking tasks will help you to configure your deployment for integration:
section.note: The use of iSCSI requires network connectivity from all OpenStack controller and compute nodes to the VNX management network and the VNX iSCSI network. You must configure VNX storage and storage pools using EMC Unisphere or Naviseccli. These instructions use Naviseccli to configure VNX storage.
section.p:

section.note:
